TEXT: e1: No human being or human committee should again be given the permission to rule over 'life or death'.
CN RELATION: human being, human committee (PartOf)/human being, rule over life or death (NotCapableOf)/human committee, rule over life or death (NotCapableOf)

TEXT: e2: Courts are also subject to human error.
CN RELATION: court, make human errors (CapableOf)/human errors, court (PartOf)/courts, subject to human error (HasProperty)

TEXT: e3: That's why Germany should not introduce capital punishment!
CN RELATION: Germany, introduce capital punishment (NotCapableOf)/capital punishment, Germany (NotAtLocation)/capital punishment, introduced (NotReceivesAction)

TEXT: e4: Every human, even those who have committed a despicable crime, can bring themselves to regret and change their opinion.
CN RELATION: human, commit a despicable crime (CapableOf)/human, regret (CapableOf)/human, change their opinion (CapableOf)/opinion, changed (ReceivesAction)/crime, regretted (ReceivesAction)

TEXT: e5: A door must remain open for making amends.
